Use.Explanation: The following items now have a "Use" option like evolutionary stones.

Cost.Explanation: The following items have had adjustments to their costs.

TMs.Explanation: The following items now cost zero and are thus unsellable.

TMs with chanced moves.Explanation: The following TMs have had their moves changed (compatibility matches Ultra Sun and Ultra Moon plus extras as listed in Pokémon Changes):

Additional Changes.Explanation: Additionally, all TMs will now have a quantity of 99 when obtained.
Additional points: No TMs are available within Poké Marts.
An NPC at the Pokémon League can reset your inventory to have 99 of all TMs.

TM Locations.Explanation: A * means the location has changed from the original Platinum.

Key Items.Explanation:
A * means the location has changed from the original Platinum.
A ** means the key item is new to Renegade Platinum.

Replaced Items.Explanation:
The following items (some unobtainable) have been replaced with items from other games.
Items under the "Old Item" column are now unavailable.
Replaced Items.Label:
